mapper.select: SELECT /* */ REG_DATE AS regDate /* */ , TELEMSG_NO AS telemsgNo /* */ , PRTSACNUT_NO AS prtsacnutNo /* */ , VIRTL_ACNUT_NO AS virtlAcnutNo /* */ , BLCE_SMBOL AS blceSmbol /* */ , BLCE AS blce /* */ , DEFRAY_POSBL_AMOUNT AS defrayPosblAmount /* */ , RSPNS_CODE AS rspnsCode /* */ , RSPNS_MSSAGE AS rspnsMssage /* */ , SEND_YN AS sendYn /* */ FROM T0500100 WHERE 1=1 AND REG_DATE = #{regDate} AND SEND_YN = #{sendYn}
